sen.j: 西舞鶴（にしまいづる）は、現在の舞鶴市の西半分。
sen.e: Nishi-Maizuru is the western half of present Maizuru City.
Nishi-Maizuru is the western half of present Maizuru City.
Nishi-Maizuru is the western half of present Maizuru City.

sen.j: 1943年5月27日に東舞鶴市と合併するまでの舞鶴市に相当し、旧舞鶴市とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It corresponds to Old Maizuru City before it merged with Higashi-Maizuru City, and is called Kyu-maizuru City, Old Maizuru City.
It corresponds to Old Maizuru City before it merged with Higashi-Maizuru City, and is called Kyu-maizuru City, Old Maizuru City.
It corresponds to the old Maizuru City before it merged with Higashi-Maizuru City on May 27 1943, and is called Kyu-maizuru City (old Maizuru City).
Outline
Outline
Summary

sen.j: 愛宕山を望む田辺城 (丹後国)（舞鶴城）の城下町と、加佐地区を合わせた舞鶴市の西半分を指す。
sen.e: Nishi-Maizuru refers to the western half of Maizuru City that constitutes the castle town of Tanabe-jo Castle (Tango Province) (Maizuru-jo Castle) having a fine view of Mt. Atago as well as Kasa area.

Nishi-Maizuru refers to the western half of Maizuru City that constitutes the castle town of Tanabe-jo Castle (Tango Province) (Maizuru-jo Castle) having a fine view of Mt. Atago as well as Kasa area.

Nishi-Maizuru refers to the western half of Maizuru City that constitutes the castle town of Tanabe-jo Castle (Tango Province) (Maizuru-jo Castle) having a fine view of Mt. Atago as well as Kasa area.

sen.j: 東舞鶴とは異なり、江戸時代は城下町として舞鶴港や伊佐津川を中心に発展し、また近代は商業都市として発展した。
sen.e: Unlike Higashi-Maizuru, Nishi-Maizuru developed as a castle town mainly around the Maizuru Port and the Isatsu-gawa River in the Edo Period, and as a commercial city in recent times.
Unlike Higashi-Maizuru, Nishi-Maizuru developed as a castle town mainly around the Maizuru Port and the Isatsu-gawa River in the Edo Period, and as a commercial city in recent times.
Unlike Higashi-Maizuru, Nishi-Maizuru developed as a castle town mainly around the Maizuru Port and the Isatsu-gawa River in the Edo period, and as a commercial city in recent times.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。

sen.j: 旧田辺城の近辺には由緒ある社寺が多く残る。
sen.e: There remain many historic shrines and temples around the site of the Old Tanabe-jo Castle.
There remain many historic shrines and temples around the site of the Old Tanabe-jo Castle.
There remain many historic shrines and temples around the site of the Old Tanabe-jo Castle.

sen.j: 現在では、裁判所など国や京都府の出先機関が数多く立地しており、2005年（平成17年）4月に舞鶴東警察署と舞鶴西警察署が統合した舞鶴警察署や第八管区海上保安本部がある。
sen.e: Today there are many regional branches of national or prefectural courts and governments; for example, Maizuru Police Station, which was established through merger of Maizuru Higashi Police Station and Maizuru Nishi Police Station in 2005, as well as the 8th Regional Coast Guard Headquarters.

Today there are many regional branches of national or prefectural courts and governments; for example, Maizuru Police Station, which was established through the merging of Maizuru Higashi Police Station and Maizuru Nishi Police Station in 2005, as well as the 8th Regional Coast Guard Headquarters.

Today there are many regional branches of national or prefectural courts and governments; for example, Maizuru Police Station, which was established through the merging of Maizuru Higashi Police Station and Maizuru Nishi Police Station in April 2005, as well as the Eighth Regional Coast Guard Headquarters.
sen.cmt: 4月 を追加しました。数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 又、倉谷工業団地 (京都)には資生堂やキリンビバレッジなどの企業も操業中であり、現在は喜多工業団地への企業誘致に積極的に取り組んでいる。
sen.e: In addition, there are enterprises in operation such as Shiseido Co., Ltd. and Kirin Beverage Company, Limited in Kuratani Industrial Park (Kyoto), and Kita Industrial Park is active in inviting companies.

In addition, there are enterprises in operation such as Shiseido Co., Ltd. and Kirin Beverage Company, Ltd. in Kuratani Industrial Park (Kyoto), and Kita Industrial Park is active in inviting companies.

In addition, there are enterprises in operation such as Shiseido Co., Ltd. and Kirin Beverage Company, Ltd. in Kuratani Industrial Park (Kyoto), and Kita Industrial Park is active in inviting companies.

sen.j: なお五老岳にある五老スカイタワーからは西舞鶴の街並みを展望することができる。
sen.e: Goro Sky Tower on Gorogadake Mountain commands a view of the townscape of Nishi-Maizuru.
sen.cmt: 「なお」は特に意味がないので訳出していません。
sen.e: Goro Sky Tower on Gorogadake Mountain commands a view of the townscape of Nishi-Maizuru.
Goro Sky Tower on Mt. Gorogadake commands a view of the townscape of Nishi-Maizuru.
